channel.title: Running 2 Accounts on Virtual Machine?
channel.description: Would it be possible to run a virtual machine on your computer so y'all could play on 2 or more accounts at the same time without being banned? So maybe like have 2 OSes running and have a RS account on each OS?

item.title: Running 2 Accounts on Virtual Machine?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I use log me in’s thing and i can play on two accounts. 1 on my computer and 1 on my freinds computer, thourgh the log me in thing. its pretty cool, but you need a freind.

Read full topic

item.title: Running 2 Accounts on Virtual Machine?
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

I have thought about this before myself, and as far as I know, the virtual machine has it’s own internal IP on your network. And seeing as you are able to play RuneScape from two different computers on the same internal network, I think it is perfectly possible.

Read full topic
